fieldData.title: Confederation of Industry: Recommendations for a restart
fieldData.title_nationalLanguage: Svaz průmyslu a dopravy ČR: Doporučení pro restart ekonomiky
fieldData.calc_minorCategory: Promoting the economic, labour market and social recovery
fieldData.descriptionBackgroundInfo: The Confederation of Industry of the Czech Republic [Svaz průmyslu a dopravy České republiky (http://www.spcr.cz)], SP ČR has presented Recommendations for a restart and the long-term renewal of growth of the Czech economy. SP ČR has set up an expert group, which has developed ten measures which, if being applied by the Czech government, can contribute to the rapid renewal of the economy's potential for long-term growth.
fieldData.descriptionContentOfMeasure: The document presents measures which could help to restart Czech economy after the COVID-19 pandemic. Among most important are the following:* Business R&D must be a government priority,* Promoting investment and demand by ensuring sufficient funds for the construction and renewal of transport and data infrastructure, availability of financial instruments such as guarantees and state loans etc.* Structural reforms are also necessary - the economy will not be saved by direct support in the form of subsidies, social programs and guarantees, the best way for future prosperity and sustainable development are innovations, educated and skilled workforce, flexible labour market, digital transformation, especially in public services and integration to the world economy.* water management, climate protection and circular economy are also challenges for the long term growth.The whole document is also available in English.
fieldData.descriptionInvolvementOfSocialPartners: SP ČR has prepared the document itself.
